page.title: 10Durweston School:Our Time 2
page.content: { Weekends} This is a list of the things that people like to do on a weekend: 7 people visit their relations. 4 people go out for a walk. 4 people go to the seaside. 3 people go to Poole Park. 3 people go shopping. 2 people take their dogs to a Dog Show. This is what only one person likes to do: go to Bournemouth, go to Bryanston Club, go to church, go swimming. {Holidays} Five people went to Devon on holiday recently and three families went to Cornwall. This is a list of the places which were visited by only one family: Italy, Japan, the Lake District, Cheddar, Stratford-upon-Avon, Yorkshire, Scotland, and Wales. One person went to stay with their father.
